analysis.purpose: To inform Jeffrey Epstein about Duke Buchan III's connections to Trump and seek Epstein's knowledge about him

notable_quotes: This guy apparently is constantly texting Trump/Trump.

details: Sender is a Financial Reporter for New York Times

public_knowledge.context: Email sent shortly after 2016 presidential election, discussing connections between financial figures and the incoming administration

analysis.summary: New York Times financial reporter Landon Thomas, Jr. emails Jeffrey Epstein with high importance to inquire about Duke Buchan III, noting that Buchan appears to have direct text message access to President-elect Trump, suggesting Epstein may have knowledge of this connection.
